messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': '
        Task: Calculate PVGIS solar potential for San francisco, Larkin Street
        
        Steps:
        1. Open Firefox
        2. Go to https://re.jrc.ec.europa.eu/pvg_tools/en/
        3. Type "San francisco, Larkin Street" in Address field, click Go!
        4. Wait for the map to center on the location
        5. In the orange panel, configure:
           - PV technology: Crystalline silicon (already selected)
           - Installed peak PV power: 1 (keep default)
           - System loss: 14 (keep default)
        6. Click "Visualize results" (blue button)
        7. Wait for the orange results page
        8. Find the "Simulation outputs:" section and read:
           - Line "Yearly PV energy production [kWh]:" → note the value
           - Line "Yearly in-plane irradiation [kWh/m²]:" → note the value
        
        MANDATORY: End your response with exactly this:
        "EXTRACTED DATA:
        Production: [value] kWh
